description:
## Objective
The objective is to create the view product mix component and design its user interface.

### Description
1. Create the view product mix component under the products -> products mix section.
2. Connect it via routing from products mix table in products mix component so that its accessible.
3. Make sure to read the guidelines to replicate a screen from [here](https://github.com/openMF/web-app/wiki/Replicate-an-existing-Community-App-screen-into-the-new-Web-App).
4. Design the user interface for the view product mix component using angular material components and flex layout directives to ensure responsiveness. (Use Angular Material Typography instead of SCSS wherever possible, refer more recently created components for reference)
5. Fetch the data of product mix component by implementing the required API.
6. Write comments for the implemented component.

#### References
You may have a look at the current implemented components in `accounting`, `system` or `products` section for reference.

## How to get help 
If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or ask in our [chatroom](https://gitter.im/openMF/web-app).

All the best! Do remember, quality over quantity is the key.
